name: grader
description: Template for cross-platform Node, JavaScript, HTML & CSS apps without the bloat. 'Massless' apps.

scripts.build: npm run clean || : && npx webpack && npx nexe --silent -t windows -o bin/grader.exe -i build/grader.js -r "./build/*.grader.js" -r "./src/public/*" && npx nexe --silent -t linux-x64 -o bin/grader.nix -i build/grader.js -r "./build/*.grader.js" -r "./src/public/*" && npx nexe --silent -t macos-x64 -o bin/grader.mac -i build/grader.js -r "./build/*.grader.js" -r "./src/public/*" && npx nexe --silent -t windows-x32 -o bin/grader.win32.exe -i build/grader.js -r "./build/*.grader.js" -r "./src/public/*" && npx nexe --silent -t linux-x32 -o bin/grader.nix32 -i build/grader.js -r "./build/*.grader.js" -r "./src/public/*"
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/ bin/ || : && mkdir -p build && mkdir -p bin

author: @dosy
